title: Tales of a Grandfather ... [ser. 1-3.] With notes.
author: Scott, Walter
snippet: He was obliged to fly to the West Border, where his brothersand followers sustained a severe defeat from the Scotts and other Borderers, neara place called Arkinholme, in the valley of Esk.
